attributes.action: Make Denmark’s barbaric tradition of slaughtering whales and dolphins illegal!
attributes.background: Thousands of citizens take part in the killings of dolphins and whales. It’s legal!!!!! We’re going to lose many sea life at this rate, please help and sign this petition.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to urge the government of Denmark to take action to protect whales and dolphins, if that's what you would like to happen.
